nodes.documentation:
@author Senapati Sang Diwangkara, from Affluent team
@title The Staking Contract
Staking is a contract that handles the voting part of the Clint system. It also
provides the means for administrator to set reward and punishment rate of the
correct/false stake
The logic in this contract is inspired by ERC-20's delegated transfer mechanism,
where voter -> spender and candidate -> owner
Among the 3 contracts, this contract must be deployed last, because it depends on the
other two contracts.
nodes.name: Staking

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The candidate isn't asking any vote"

arguments.value: The candidate isn't asking any vote

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The candidate isn't asking any vote"

@param _candidate The address whom the sender staked to

@param value New lowerThreshold value

@param value New rewardRateNum value

nodes.documentation:

@param value New punishmentRateNum value

nodes.documentation:

@param _candidate The candidate who will be checked

_giveIncentive

nodes.name: _resetAllStakesOn

devdoc.author: Senapati Sang Diwangkara, from Affluent team

cancelStake(address).details: Cancel the sender's stake on a candidate

params._candidate: The address whom the sender staked to

setLowerThreshold(int256).details: Set the total stake's lower threshold. Can only be called by root

setPunishmentRateDenom(uint256).details: Set the punishment rate's denominator. Can only be called by root

setPunishmentRateNum(uint256).details: Set the punishment rate's numerator. Can only be called by root

setRewardRateDenom(uint256).details: Set the reward rate's denominator. Can only be called by root

setRewardRateNum(uint256).details: Set the reward rate's numerator. Can only be called by root

setStake(address,int256).details: Set the stake that a voter will vouch for a candidate In ERC-20, this is called `allowed` and instead of owner, spender will be set as input	NOTE: prevent race condition by setting the _value to 0 first before	setting it to the value we want. This must be done in the frontend.

params._candidate: The address whose voter stake to

setUpperThreshold(int256).details: Set the total stake's upper threshold. Can only be called by root

devdoc.title: The Staking Contract Staking is a contract that handles the voting part of the Clint system. It also provides the means for administrator to set reward and punishment rate of the correct/false stake The logic in this contract is inspired by ERC-20's delegated transfer mechanism, where voter -> spender and candidate -> owner Among the 3 contracts, this contract must be deployed last, because it depends on the other two contracts.
